mapper.select: select * from ( select od.gameType,od. gameDesc as`description`,od.amount , (select IFNULL(u1.shareUp,0) as shareUp from user u1 where u1.parentId =#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u1.Id in(od.UserId,u.DagudongId,u.GudongId,u.ZongdailiId,u.DailiId)) * od.Amount/100 as shareTotal , od.odds,od.oddset FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN Handicap on od.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN user u on u.id = od.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIND_IN_SET(od.gameType,#{p_gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND xpath like CONCAT(#{p_xpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) t order by shareTotal LIMIT #{p_start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{p_pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from ( select od.gameType,od. gameDesc as`description`,od.amount , (select IFNULL(u1.shareUp,0) as shareUp from user u1 where u1.parentId =#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u1.Id in(od.UserId,u.DagudongId,u.GudongId,u.ZongdailiId,u.DailiId)) * od.Amount/100 as shareTotal , od.odds,od.oddset FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN Handicap on od.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN user u on u.id = od.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIND_IN_SET(od.gameType,#{p_gameType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND xpath like CONCAT(#{p_xpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) t

select cc.category,sum( (select IFNULL(u1.shareUp,0) as shareUp from user u1 where u1.parentId =#{p_userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u1.Id in(od.UserId,u.DagudongId,u.GudongId,u.ZongdailiId,u.DailiId)) * od.Amount/100) as zhancheng FROM orders INNER JOIN orderdetail od on orders.Id = od.orderId INNER JOIN Handicap on orders.handicapId= Handicap.Id INNER JOIN categoryconfig cc on cc.gametype = od.gametype INNER JOIN user u on u.id = orders.userId where od.handicapId =#{p_handicapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND xpath like CONCAT(#{p_xpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') GROUP BY cc.category
